price: 42. Beta (mabele) na makolo nayo, oyo ezali mayi ya тріо mpo osukola mpe órnela mosusu.
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
